title: Why energy efficiency should matter this World Ozone Day
description: As climate change accelerates, the need for efficient cooling systems becomes crucial. The Kigali Amendment aims to phase down harmful refrigerants and improve energy efficiency. This effort can significantly reduce greenhouse gas emissions and offer health benefits. Coordinated efforts across various stakeholders are essential to achieve these goals.
